description: A ticketprinter is a system to print waiting numbers for clients. Usually it has a touch screen and a printing device.

name.description: Name of the Button, shown value

type.description: Type of the button, for complement links

enabled.description: To enable or disable button usage

url.description: url to scope, cluster or external target

buttonlist.description: comma separated list of scope, cluster, links (s = scope, c = cluster, l = link), max of 6 buttons

enabled.description: true if browser is allowed to hand out waiting numbers to the client

hash.description: identifier for a browser (usually cookie content)

lastUpdate.description: unix timestamp of last status change

reload.description: time to redirect to homepage in seconds
